Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! I heard you were fixin' to give your animals a
nice place to live, so I came by to lend a hand.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, let's get to work! I'll give you pointers
as we go, so do like I tell you, 'kay?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good job! That's a fine piece of work you've
done. Be proud of what you've built!
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'll be headin' on home, then.

Yay! The animals are going to love this! Let's
check out what it looks like inside!
